summary: I WAS DRIVING MY COBALT SATURDAY MORNING AND POWER STEERING WENT OUT. I STOPPED CAR AND TURNED ENGINE OFF. I STARTED CAR AND WAS ABLE TO DRIVE IT BUT THE POWER STEERING WENT OUT AGAIN. THIS IS VERY DANGEROUS. I HAVE THREE SMALL CHILDREN. I AM GOING TO THE DEALERSHIP TOMORROW AND EXPECT THE RUNAWAY. BUT I AM WELL AWARE THAT THIS VEHICLE SHOULD HAVE BEEN RECALLED A LONG TIME AGO FROM WHAT I HAVE READ. PLEASE DO SOME THING BEFORE SOMEONE IS SERIOUSLY INJURED OR KILLED. *TR
